title: U.S. Pool Supply Professional in-line Pool Leaf Canister with Plastic Mesh Basket - Skims Leaves, Debris - Fits Suction & Automatic Pool Cleaners
features: A professional in-line leaf canister designed to trap leaves and debris effectively, which prevents the clogging of pool pumps, skimmer baskets, and filters, so your pool filtering system will need less servicing. Use it to keep your pool clean and ready for use.

The easy to open screw-on lid provides quick access to the large plastic mesh debris basket. The durable solid clear canister body allows you to see at a glance when the filter basket requires emptying.

Premium quality 6" long by 9" diameter leaf canister that fits in-line between two 1-1/2" pool cleaner vacuum hose sections. The leaf canister should be plumbed between the first and second hose sections from the pool wall.
The pool leaf canister also includes two attachments that are not required when using the canister with 1-1/2" hose section connections.
Canister attaches for use with most name brands of suction, manual, and automatic pool cleaners.
description: U.S. Pool Supply Professional In-line Pool Leaf Canister with Plastic Mesh Filter Basket - Fits 1-1/2” Swimming Pool Cleaner Vacuum Hose Sections

This professional in-line leaf canister is designed to trap leaves and debris effectively, which prevents the clogging of pool pumps, skimmer baskets, and filters, so your pool filtering system will need less servicing. Use it to keep your pool clean and ready for use. The easy to open screw-on lid provides quick access to the large plastic mesh debris basket. The durable solid clear canister body allows you to see at a glance when the filter basket requires emptying.

Premium quality 6" long by 9" diameter leaf canister that fits in-line between two 1-1/2" pool cleaner vacuum hose sections. The leaf canister should be plumbed between the first and second hose sections from the pool wall. The pool leaf canister also includes two attachments that are not required when using the canister with 1-1/2" hose section connections. Canister attaches for use with most name brands of suction, manual, and automatic pool cleaners.
U.S. Pool Supply is your online source for professional high-quality, affordable pool cleaning and maintenance supplies, pool accessories, pool recreational activity pool toys, and floats.

We offer all the essential items needed to help residential pool owners care for and maintain their pools so that they can eliminate the need for expensive scheduled pool service technicians. Our goal is to provide you the premium products you need to keep your pool clean and ready for use, so you can focus on what's most important, enjoying your pool!
